.about

Hi, I`m Chris junior front-end and JavaScript web developer based in Posnan, Poland. I`v been developing my coding skills for most part of last year, until I decided to take a coding boot camp. The choice was easy, as one of the biggest players on the local market was Coders Labs I went with them. Before that I learned quite a bit of HTML, CSS, JS, and also done some things with jQuery. Then I started my Git Hub account and began documenting my projects there, and also I finished web based Free Code Camp curriculum. I felt quite good with my skills but only when I started Coders Labs I saw it excel, also than come React and ES6.
